name: Tiny Fall-Out Bird Smash-y - Catch The End Of A Flappy Falling Squishy Chick
name_original: Tiny Fall-Out Bird Smash-y - Catch The End Of A Flappy Falling Squishy Chick
description:
******* Free Falling Bird Game! ******

***** Addicting platformer action *****

Do you love birds? Save them from smashing to the ground in this funkiest arcade game ever!

With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid dynamics you'll want to keep playing and playing. Simply move the nest to catch the birds from hitting the pavement. It’s annoying, addictive and especially fun.

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Super easy gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Harness the power of pure fun!

Download FREE Today!
